verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Wewe Bwana Mungu wetu
jinsi lilivyo tukufu (jina)
jinsi lilivyo tukufu
jina lako duniani mwote. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Nikiziangalia mbingu
ni kazi yako Bwana,
Mwezi pia na nyota
ulizoratibisha wewe,
naona ajabu ajabu ajabu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Naye mtu ni nini Bwana,
hata umkumbuke,
na binadamu hata
yeye umwangazie.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kondoo nao ng'ombe
pia wanyama wa kondeni,
ndege pia samaki
ndani ya bahari.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Umemfanya punde punde
mdogo kuliko Mungu,
umemvika taji taji ya heshima.
